price: (Àwọn ni) àwọn tó ń kírun, tí wọ́n sì ń ná nínú ohun tí A pèsè fún wọn.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuqīmūna al-ṣalata wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
